dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3619 IH: Rock Creek National Park Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia as Rock Creek National Park.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rock Creek National Park Act of 2015.

section.header: Redesignation of Rock Creek Park as Rock Creek National Park

subsection.text: In recognition of its nationally significant natural, cultural, and historical resources, and important recreational opportunities, Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia, established by the Act of September 27, 1890 (26 Stat. 492), is redesignated as Rock Creek National Park.
Title 40, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in section 8104(b), by striking Rock Creek Park and inserting Rock Creek National Park; and
in section 8501(a)(3)(B), by striking Rock Creek Park and inserting Rock Creek National Park.

subsection.text: Any reference in any law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia is deemed to be a reference to Rock Creek National Park.
